name: @rebolon/ng-address-data-gouv
author: Rebolon
description: A simple angular component to find French address from https://adresse.data.gouv.fr/api-doc

scripts.build: ng build --project lib && ng build --output-hashing=none --project app && npm run concat && npm run copy-before-publish && npm run build-docs
scripts.build-docs: cp -r dist/app/* docs && rm docs/main.js docs/polyfills.js docs/runtime.js && sed -i 's/base href=".*"/base href="\/ng-address-data-gouv\/"/' docs/index.html
scripts.concat: mkdir dist/app/assets/js && mv dist/app/styles.css dist/app/assets/css/ && cp projects/app/src/index-for-docs.html dist/app/index.html && node_modules/.bin/concat -o dist/app/assets/js/output.js dist/app/runtime.js dist/app/polyfills.js dist/app/main.js
scripts.copy-before-publish: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/
